title: 08/18/2021 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 08/18/2021 DPS Best of
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress, in for Dan, discuss whether or not Tim Tebow deserved the chance he got in Jacksonville. The guys take issue with Giants President John Mara being "sick and tired of taunting" in the league and they debate who will have the best rookie season between Justin Fields, Trevor Lawrence, Mac Jones, Trey Lance and Zach Wilson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
